body.p: We are pleased to introduce the editorial board for the second edition of GHDI. The board consists of newcomers to GHDI as well as veteran editors who contributed to the first edition. We are grateful to all of our colleagues for generously contributing their time and expertise to this collective effort.

div.head: First Edition (2004–2012)
div.p: At a time when the internet was still relatively young, the original GHDI editors took a chance on a new type of history project. We thank them for their excellent work, which built the foundation of today’s GHDI. The first edition has been preserved in its entirety and can be accessed here.
